semantic_identifier: [GOLD-96]: Exclude unmapped/mis-mapped lifecycle records from forecasting + lifecycle analytics
title: Exclude unmapped/mis-mapped lifecycle records from forecasting + lifecycle analytics

sections.text: Update forecasting and lifecycle-based analytics aggregations to consume only canonical lifecycle values and to drop records flagged with a lifecycle mapping error (e.g., unmapped stage/required field missing). Ensure stage-based rollups, conversion rates, and slippage signals do not fall back to raw CRM stage names when canonical mapping is absent. Add a small set of regression tests using mixed mapped/unmapped stage inputs to verify noisy records no longer skew metrics.
